column2: this might sound kind of silly but I got into an argument a few days ago with my boyfriend because we do not agree on what the correct word is to start the New York Times Wordle game
I'm doing well it's sunny this morning and so that always puts me in a good mood
the last time that I felt really happy was over the weekend I was at a game night with some of my friends and we were eating my favorite food and I got to hang out with my favorite people
I have trouble getting a good night's sleep I have a lot of work so a lot of time I only sleep six to seven hours a night I prefer to sleep at least eight hours a night
I feel guilty about eating all of my cousin's Reece's cups when I was little she lives in India and bought them on a trip whereas I could have had them any time when I was home
